snippet.title: Meet Hoge, the meme that's wrong about the NFL Draft
snippet.description:

Such takes. Much tie. Wow.

snippet.title: Odell Beckham Jr. 2014 NFL Draft scouting report
snippet.description:
Odell Beckham Jr. 2014 NFL Draft scouting report by Dan Kadar on Apr 21 2014, 11:00a
LSU's top receiver last season is poised to be a first-round pick in the draft. It's just a matter of how high he'll get taken.

snippet.title: 2014 NFL Mock Draft: Derek Carr, Teddy Bridgewater & an unpredictable quarterback class
snippet.description:
2014 NFL Mock Draft: Derek Carr, Teddy Bridgewater & an unpredictable quarterback class by Matthew Fairburn on Apr 21 2014, 8:00a
Predicting the 2014 NFL Draft isn't easy, but we took another crack at it with a collaborative mock draft this week.

snippet.title: Quotables: Browns work out Johnny Manziel, Adrian Peterson thinks Matt Cassel will start
snippet.description:
Quotables: Browns work out Johnny Manziel, Adrian Peterson thinks Matt Cassel will start by Jeff Gray on Apr 20 2014, 4:05p
The Browns skipped Manziel's pro day but did attend a private workout over the weekend. Elsewhere, Peterson expressed his confidence in Cassel and Marcus Lattimore says he's finally recovered from...

snippet.title: 2014 NFL Draft: Ed Reynolds can't wait to be at training camp (again)
snippet.description:
2014 NFL Draft: Ed Reynolds can't wait to be at training camp (again) by Louis Bien on Apr 19 2014, 6:00p
Stanford safety Ed Reynolds was once a ball boy at Giants training camp. He spoke with SB Nation, about returning to the NFL field, except as a top draft pick.

snippet.title: Mad money: QB draft stock edition
snippet.description:
Mad money: QB draft stock edition by PFT Commenter on Apr 18 2014, 1:51p
Buy Tom Savage. Sell Teddy Bridgewater. It's all so confusing, but PFT Commenter is here to yell speific instructions telling you exactly what to do.

snippet.title: 2014 NFL Draft: Adrian Hubbard doesn't have a bad attitude, just ask him
snippet.description:
2014 NFL Draft: Adrian Hubbard doesn't have a bad attitude, just ask him by Louis Bien on Apr 19 2014, 8:30a
Adrian Hubbard sat down with SB Nation to discuss Nolan Nawrocki, his favorite pass rushing tricks and Alabama's greatness.

snippet.title: Teddy Bridgewater is comparable to a fictional character, says NFL coach
snippet.description:
